function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Panic-buying and stockpiling of food products","Impact":"Shortages of food products, late or undelivered food deliveries, reduced donations to food banks, vulnerable populations unable to find food","Mitigation":"Restrict the amount of each product an individual can buy, provide support to vulnerable populations, reassurance to the public","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, online delivery tracking, food distribution apps","People":"Vulnerable populations, food banks, retailers, food delivery companies","Owner":"UK government, food retailers, food delivery companies"},{"Description":"Increased demand for food products","Impact":"Strain on food distribution and retailing, late or undelivered food deliveries, reduced donations to food banks, vulnerable populations unable to find food","Mitigation":"Increased production of essential food products, reassurance to the public, support for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Automation in food production, inventory management systems, food delivery apps","People":"Vulnerable populations, food banks, retailers, food delivery companies, food manufacturers","Owner":"Food manufacturers, food retailers, food delivery companies"},{"Description":"Inefficient distribution and delivery of food products","Impact":"Late or undelivered food deliveries, vulnerable populations unable to find food, strain on food distribution and retailing","Mitigation":"Optimization of delivery routes, increased delivery capacity, support for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Route optimization software, delivery tracking apps, real-time delivery monitoring","People":"Vulnerable populations, food banks, retailers, food delivery companies","Owner":"Food delivery companies, food retailers"}]}
